entry.title: Friday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to flurries near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
